verbs.description: On Wednesday , June 13 , 2018 ( 6/13/18 ) it [V: was] announced that the North American bid submitted by the U.S. , Canada , and Mexico won the right to host the 2026 World Cup . The final is expected to be played at MetLife Stadium in East Rutherford , N.J. President Donald Trump is taking credit for the winning bid .
